All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminDashboard
This class creates administrator dashboar to allow the administrator to manage the shop.
CustomersPanel
This class creates a panel used in the administrator dashboard that is showing all customers in the database.
EmailException
This class handle email errors on signup screen
InvoicesPanel
This class creates a panel used in the administrator dashboard that is showing all invoices in the database.
ItemsPanel
This class creates a panel used in the Admin Dashboard that is showing all products in the database and allow adding new products.
Login
This class creates login window allowing the user to login to the account.
LoginException
This class handle errors on login screen
MyAccPanel
This class creats the panel for the user dashboard that contains user account information.
OrdersHisPanel
This class creates a panel used in the administrator dashboard that is showing all orders in the database.
PasswordException
This class handles password errors.
SettingsPanel
This class creats the panel for the user dashboard that allows the user to edith his account details.
SignUp
This class creates the signup form window allowing the user to create an account in the database.
SignUpException
This class handle errors on signup screen
StorePanel
This class creats the panel for the user dashboard that contains all product from database which user can buy.
UserDashboard
This class creates a user dashboard that allows place new orders, view order history and manages the account.
